AttributeBasedAdjRule.name: AttributeBasedAdjRule
AttributeBasedAdjRule.description: Represents the attribute conditions in a rule associated with the attribute based adjustment made for a product or service being sold.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date the attribute based adjustment rule was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

Name.description: Name of the attribute based adjustment rule.

OwnerId.description: ID of the owner of the attribute based adjustment rule.

UsageType.description: The type of record where the attribute-based adjustment rule is used.
